title: sharaNam aDaindiDu
sahitya:
sharaNam aDaindiDu manamE sharavaNabhavaniDam


anupallavi

  dharaNi tanil enda tApam vanda pOdum tiraNamenra tanai karudum urudi peravE


caraNam    mEnmEl vEdanai tarum innalun mEl mOda tunbam tAngA tEngi tuDituDikkum pOdu
ten pazhani Ongi daNDAyudam tAngi vanmaiyil vITra vaDivElanip-pOTri
